datafield.subfield: Observation of $D^+\to\eta\eta\pi^+$ and improved measurement of $D^{0(+)}\to\eta\pi^+\pi^{-(0)}$
Observation of the $X(2370)$ and Search for the $X(2120)$ in $J/\psi\to\gamma K\bar{K} \eta'$
Measurement of the $e^+e^-\to\pi^+\pi^-\pi^0$ Cross Section from 0.7 GeV to 3.0 GeV via Initial-State Radiation
White Paper on the Future Physics Programme of BESIII
Search for baryon and lepton number violating decays $D^+\to\bar\Lambda(\bar\Sigma^0)e^+$ and $D^+\to\Lambda(\Sigma^0)e^+$
Measurement of $J/\psi\to\Xi(1530)^{-}\bar\Xi^{+}$ and evidence for the radiative decay $\Xi(1530)^{-}\to\gamma\Xi^-$
Cross section measurement of $e^+e^- \rightarrow \eta'J/\psi$ from $\sqrt{s} = 4.178$ to $4.600$ GeV
Measurement of the cross section for $e^{+}e^{-}\rightarrow\Xi^{-}\bar\Xi^{+}$ and observation of an excited $\Xi$ baryon
Study of $e^{+}e^{-} \to D^{+} D^{-} \pi^{+} \pi^{-} $ at center-of-mass energies from 4.36 to 4.60 GeV
Improved measurements of the absolute branching fractions of the inclusive decays $D^{+(0)}\to\phi X$
Search for the rare decay $\eta'\rightarrow\pi^{0}\pi^{0}\pi^{0}\pi^{0}$ at BESIII
Observation of the Semileptonic $D^+$ Decay into the $\bar K_1(1270)^0$ Axial-Vector Meson
Measurement of branching fractions for $D$ meson decaying into $\phi$ meson and a pseudoscalar meson
Cross section measurements of $e^{+}e^{-} \to K^{+}K^{-}K^{+}K^{-} $ and $ \phi K^{+}K^{-}$ at center-of-mass energies from 2.10 to 3.08 GeV
Measurement of branching fractions of $\psi(3686)\to \phi\eta^\prime, \phi f_1(1285)$ and $\phi \eta(1405)$
Study of $e^+e^- \to \pi^+ \pi^- \pi^0 \eta_c$ and evidence for $Z_c$(3900)$^\pm$ decaying into $\rho^\pm \eta_c$
Measurement of proton electromagnetic form factors in $e^+e^- \to p\bar{p}$ in the energy region 2.00 - 3.08 GeV
Measurements of Weak Decay Asymmetries of $\Lambda_c^+\to pK_S^0$, $\Lambda\pi^+$, $\Sigma^+\pi^0$, and $\Sigma^0\pi^+$
Complete Measurement of the $\Lambda$ Electromagnetic Form Factors
Amplitude Analysis and Branching Fraction Measurement of $D^0\rightarrow K^-\pi^+\pi^0\pi^0$
Measurements of the branching fractions of $\eta_c\to K^+K^-\pi^0$, $K^0_S K^{\pm}\pi^{\mp}$,$2(\pi^+\pi^-\pi^0)$, and $p \bar{p}$
Study of $e^+e^- \to \gamma \omega J/\psi$ and Observation of $X(3872) \to \omega J/\psi$

Amplitude analysis of $D_{s}^{+} \rightarrow \pi^{+}\pi^{0}\eta$ and first observation of the pure $W$-annihilation decays $D_{s}^{+} \rightarrow a_{0}(980)^{+}\pi^{0}$ and $D_{s}^{+} \rightarrow a_{0}(980)^{0}\pi^{+}$
Study of the Decays $D_{s}^{+} \rightarrow K_{S}^{0}K^{+}$ and $K_{L}^{0}K^{+}$
Cross section measurements of $e^+ e^-\to\omega\chi_{c0}$ form $\sqrt{s}=$ 4.178 to 4.278 GeV
Measurement of the branching fraction of $J/\psi \rightarrow \omega \eta' \pi^{+}\pi^{-}$ and search for $J/\psi \rightarrow \omega X(1835), \, X(1835) \rightarrow \eta' \pi^{+}\pi^{-}$ decay
Precision Measurement of the Branching Fractions of $\eta$′ Decays
Search for heavy Majorana neutrino in lepton number violating decays of $D\to K \pi e^+ e^+$
Search for rare decay $J/ \psi \to \phi e^+ e^-$
Study of the process $e^+ e^- \to p \bar p$ via initial state radiation at BESIII
Measurement of the Dynamics of the Decays $D_s^+ \rightarrow \eta^{(\prime)} e^+ \nu_e$
